mapper.sql: id, course_uid, parent_id, serial_number, section_name, section_duration, section_link, is_try_see, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time

select rco.id, rco.course_uid, rco.parent_id, rco.serial_number, rco.section_name, rco.section_duration, rco.section_link, rco.is_try_see, rco.create_by, rco.create_time, rco.last_update_by, rco.last_update_time from roncoo_course_outline as rco
